title: Leading banks by market capitalization in Italy 2019
summary: The statistic depicts the capitalization market with the Italy banks Market in 2019 .
In that year , Intesa_Sanpaolo was the Italy banks Company with a Market capitalization of 38043.87 million euros .

data.Company Name: Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena

gold: With a market capitalization of over 38 billion euros , Intesa Sanpaolo was the leading bank in Italy listed on the Milan Stock Exchange as of September 2019.
Intesa Sanpaolo , together with its fierce competitor UniCredit , dominates the banking sector in the country.
The two banking groups are not only the leaders in the domestic market , but also ranked among the 20 leading banks in Europe in terms of market capitalization in 2019 .
